pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Amboseli sits on the lower slopes of mighty Mount Kilimanjaro - Africa's highest - whose peak lies across the border in Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 安博西利位于非洲最顶峰乞力马扎罗山的缓坡面。

sentences.english: Back on the mainland, take a bus to Moshi at the foot of Kilimanjaro.
sentences.chinese: 回到大陆，搭乘巴士去乞力马扎罗山脚下的莫希。
她还攀登了乞力马扎罗山。

definition: Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
K2, Mt Qogir or Chogori in Karakorum section of Himalayas
Andes mountain chain of South America
Mt Shishapangma or Xixiabangma in Tibet (8012 m)
Mt Cook on New Zealand South Island, national park and highest peak

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Lhotse Mountain, between Tibet and Nepal
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
